description:
---

### [choco://intel-processor-identification-utility](choco://intel-processor-identification-utility)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

![Screenshot of Intel Processor Identification Utility ](https://cdn.staticaly.com/gh/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/master/intel-processor-identification-utility/intel-processor-identification-utility_screenshot.png)

Intel® Processor Identification Utility is a free software that you can install on your machine to identify the actual specification of your processor. It displays the Graphics information, Chipset information, Technologies supported by the processor etc.

This version of the application supports automatic software update so you will be notified when there is a new update available. The list of supported processor that the tool can identify is mentioned below. [List](https://downloadcenter.intel.com/download/28539)

## intel-processor-identification-utility is for 12th Gen and newer processors, use [intel-processor-identification-utility-legacy](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/intel-processor-identification-utility-legacy) for 11th Gen and older processors

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/intel-processor-identification-utility/readme.md)**
	

---

**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**

---
summary: Displays information about your Intel processor.
author: Intel Corporation
